description.value:
Prerequisites master in Crafting, deity who grants heal divine font

You channel positive energy into restoratives that ward against harm. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Craft} an alchemical item that restores Hit Points (rather than create it with advanced alchemy, Quick Alchemy, or another means), it becomes a blessed alchemical item and gains the positive trait. For example, an @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hDLbR56Id2OtU318]{Elixir of Life} would become a blessed elixir of life. When a creature regains Hit Points using a blessed alchemical item, the overflowing energy grants them negative resistance 5 for 1 round, or negative resistance 10 if you are legendary in Crafting.

prerequisites.value: master in Crafting, deity who grants heal divine font
